sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO counseling( counseling_idx, member_idx, student_idx, counseling_title, counseling_date, counseling_content ) VALUES ( counseling_idx_seq.nextval, #teacher_idx#, #student_idx#, #counseling_title#, sysdate, #counseling_content# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE counseling SET counseling_title = #counseling_title#, counseling_date = sysdate, counseling_content = #counseling_content# WHERE counseling_idx = #counseling_idx#
sqlMap.select: select COUNSELING_IDX, MEMBER_IDX, STUDENT_IDX, COUNSELING_TITLE, COUNSELING_DATE, COUNSELING_CONTENT from counseling where student_idx = #idx#
select * from counseling c, STUDENT s where counseling_idx = #idx# AND c.STUDENT_IDX = s.STUDENT_IDX
